field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs where status = '1')⩓ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from dmdvcsks where year(ngay_ks) >= @year)⩓not exists(select 1 from cdvv b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and @@table.tk = b.tk and @@table.ma_vv = b.ma_vv and b.nam = @year) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1)⩓exists(select 1 from cdvv b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and @@table.tk = b.tk and @@table.ma_vv = b.ma_vv and b.nam = @year) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_edit = 1)

field.name: tk
field.check: tk not in (select tk from dmtk where loai_tk = 1)

field.name: ma_vv
field.check: ma_vv not in (select ma_vv from dmvv where vv_sd_pslk = '1')

field.name: ma_kh
field.check: ma_kh <> '' and ma_kh not in (select ma_kh from dmkh)⩓ma_kh <> '' and tk in (select tk from dmtk where tk_cn = 0)⩓ma_kh = '' and tk in (select tk from dmtk where tk_cn = 1)
